message.content:
7-day Dairy-Free Meal Plan

Day 1:

* Breakfast: Avocado toast with tomato, sprouts, and a drizzle of olive oil.
* Snack: Apple slices with almond butter.
* Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted sweet potatoes and steamed broccoli.
* Snack: Carrot sticks with hummus.
* Dinner: Quinoa and black bean tacos with salsa, avocado, and lime.

Day 2:

* Breakfast: Oatmeal with banana slices, chia seeds, and a drizzle of maple syrup.
* Snack: Sliced cucumber with tzatziki sauce.
* Lunch: Tuna salad wrap with lettuce, tomato, and cucumber on a whole wheat tortilla.
* Snack: Rice cakes with peanut butter and jelly.
* Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted asparagus and quinoa.

Day 3:

* Breakfast: Scrambled tofu with spinach, mushrooms, and tomatoes.
* Snack: Roasted chickpeas with spices.
* Lunch: Grilled portobello mushroom sandwich on a whole wheat bun with avocado and lettuce.
* Snack: Handful of mixed nuts (cashews, pistachios, almonds).
* Dinner: Chickpea curry with brown rice and naan bread.

Day 4:

* Breakfast: Smoothie bowl with frozen berries, banana, almond milk, and topped with granola and chia seeds.
* Snack: Roasted pumpkin seeds.
* Lunch: Turkey and cheese roll-ups with apple slices on the side.
* Snack: Rice cakes with avocado spread.
* Dinner: Grilled shrimp skewers with zucchini noodles and tomato sauce.

Day 5:

* Breakfast: Veggie omelette with spinach, mushrooms, bell peppers, and onions.
* Snack: Sliced apple with almond butter.
* Lunch: Chickpea salad wrap with mixed greens, tomato, and cucumber on a whole wheat tortilla.
* Snack: Carrot and celery sticks with hummus.
* Dinner: Grilled chicken breast with roasted sweet potatoes and green beans.

Day 6:

* Breakfast: Banana pancakes made with almond flour, topped with maple syrup and sliced bananas.
* Snack: Rice cakes with avocado spread.
* Lunch: Quinoa and black bean bowl with roasted veggies and lime dressing.
* Snack: Handful of mixed nuts (cashews, pistachios, almonds).
* Dinner: Spaghetti squash with marinara sauce and grilled chicken breast.

Day 7:

* Breakfast: Smoothie bowl with frozen berries, banana, almond milk, and topped with granola and chia seeds.
* Snack: Roasted pumpkin seeds.
* Lunch: Turkey and cheese roll-ups with apple slices on the side.
* Snack: Rice cakes with avocado spread.
* Dinner: Grilled shrimp skewers with zucchini noodles and tomato sauce.
